title: Report saving â€” .gitignore handling
query: Audit https://example.com and save the HTML report to ./audit/
expected_behavior: Completes the audit and presents findings
Since the save path is inside the project, asks whether to add the reports folder to .gitignore
If user answers Yes: appends the path to .gitignore (creates the file if missing) and confirms before generating
If user answers No: generates the report directly without touching .gitignore
Does NOT modify .gitignore without asking first
Skips the .gitignore question if the save path is outside the project (e.g., ~/Desktop/)

model_notes.all_agents: Testing the conditional .gitignore prompt: it must only trigger when the save path is inside the project root.
